room_title: Escape room "The Office" by Time Escape Loveland in Fort Collins
review: The new "The Office" themed escape room provided a fun, collaborative family experience for age 18-91 family members. Helpful, fun staff and very engaging room puzzles to work through. We'll go back for a new room soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Office" by Time Escape Loveland in Fort Collins
review: Time Escape was a fantastic experience all around. HIGHLY recommend “Escape the Office” for any avid fans. The staff was very friendly and made the experience even better. Will definitely be returning!

room_title: Escape room "The Office" by Time Escape Loveland in Fort Collins
review: If you love The Office, you will love this room. Didn't escape but we will soon!
